member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_S3D_PACKING_MODE
member.summary: Specifies the layout for a packed 3D video frame.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_S3D_PACKING_MODE.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_S3D_PACKING_MODE_SIDE_BY_SIDE
member.summary: The views are packed side-by-side in a single frame.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_S3D_PACKING_MODE.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_S3D_PACKING_MODE_TOP_BOTTOM
member.summary: The views are packed top-to-bottom in a single frame.
